data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/dKMpMwJB9Aq1fflGAcVfagfG0R5.jpg","id":1682,"title":"Mothra vs. Godzilla","original_title":"モスラ対ゴジラ","overview":"Journalists Ichiro Sakai and Junko cover the wreckage of a typhoon when an enormous egg is found and claimed by greedy entrepreneurs. As their requests are denied, Godzilla arises near Nagoya and the people of Infant Island must decide if they are willing to answer Japan's own pleas for help.","poster_path":"/y49vvM03gpuyhpyMc1f55VrNkP3.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18,28,878],"popularity":22.998,"release_date":"1964-04-29","video":false,"vote_average":7.038,"vote_count":265},{"backdrop_path":"/5nAYjMYxC8bHc7sKCFhfd6y3eMa.jpg","id":686487,"title":"King Kong vs. Godzilla","original_title":"King Kong vs. Godzilla","overview":"When an underhanded pharmaceutical company goes to a remote tropical island to steal King Kong for advertising purposes, they get more than they bargained for when the gigantic ape attacks an unsuspecting village and an enormous octopus.","poster_path":"/v4lxYywAyEuT974dVi22y8TGP0t.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,878,35],"popularity":20.835,"release_date":"1963-06-26","video":false,"vote_average":6.6,"vote_count":232},{"backdrop_path":"/xbKFQCZNK14gp9k6cFCwgp2OCtU.jpg","id":1679,"title":"Godzilla Raids Again","original_title":"ゴジラの逆襲","overview":"Two fishing scout pilots make a horrifying discovery when they encounter a second Godzilla alongside a new monster named Anguirus. Tom survives the accident with a severe chronic back injury which results in him not being able to continue with his current business. The Phillips' buy a motel in the California desert and Tom with his wife Peg and their two children, Tina and  Jamie make the long road trip to their new home. As they approach their destination they are terrorized by reckless teenage hot-rodders looking for kicks.","poster_path":"/oAOiM0noMMWKgRil6DX8YtC2Pbz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,53],"popularity":2.632,"release_date":"1967-01-27","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":14},{"backdrop_path":"/ml1b7hJ3Kr3wu3s3bC2NIxdAPNd.jpg","id":159414,"title":"The Inheritance","original_title":"からみ合い","overview":"On his deathbed, a wealthy businessman announces that his fortune is to be split equally among his three illegitimate children, whose whereabouts are unknown to his family and colleagues. While the bank's top executives continue to vacillate, a quartet of middle-management reformers, led by straight-arrow Kitano (Koji Yakusho), decide to stage a boardroom coup and install a new, clean management team. With the aid of a hotshot news anchor (Miho Wada) and a hard-nosed prosecutor (Kenichi Endo), heads begin to roll.","poster_path":"/nn4MZj2xnPBRKPQFpjddUW249Q6.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":3.839,"release_date":"1999-09-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":3},{"backdrop_path":"/bS8cS0JcxIe2kV126GINgeOxlVS.jpg","id":43226,"title":"The Mysterians","original_title":"地球防衛軍","overview":"In Japan, scientifically advanced invaders from the war-destroyed planet Mysteroid cause an entire village to vanish, then send a giant robot out to storm the city by night, after which they request a small patch of land on Earth and the right to marry earthling women, claiming to be pacifists.  Mankind must decide whether to capitulate or to resist.","poster_path":"/dAPtapXkw1ScxW8SwxWNSV3TtLV.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[878,28,18,53,10752],"popularity":9.424,"release_date":"1957-12-28","video":false,"vote_average":6.402,"vote_count":46},{"backdrop_path":"/i7Vp666mpD6xEbLxeT45eCr1ad3.jpg","id":19336,"title":"Godzilla vs. Gigan","original_title":"地球攻撃命令 ゴジラ対ガイガン","overview":"Manga artist Gengo Odaka lands a job with the World Children's Land amusement park only to become suspicious of the organization when a garbled message is discovered on tapes. But not all is what it seems with these bizarre visitors.
